hero.title: Turn Data into Powerful Decisions
hero.description: Collect, analyze, and visualize your customers' information in real time. Make smart decisions, manage projects efficiently, and take your team to the next level.

features.head: Features
features.title: Centralize and Transform Your Data
features.description: Our platform collects and organizes operational and administrative data from your business, providing you with a clear and actionable view through an intuitive dashboard.

items.title: Data Collection
items.description: Automatically capture operational and administrative data from multiple sources, ensuring all relevant information is always up-to-date and accessible.

items.title: Dashboard Visualization
items.description: Access a customizable dashboard that displays your key data in real-time, enabling informed decision-making.

items.title: Report Management
items.description: Generate and manage detailed reports with just a few clicks, allowing you to analyze performance and share insights with your team.

items.title: Data Analysis (Coming Soon)
items.description: Coming soon, we will integrate advanced data analysis tools to help you uncover trends, patterns, and opportunities for improvement in your operations.

dashboard.head: Dashboard
dashboard.title: Powerful Analytics at Your Fingertips
dashboard.description: Transform your data into actionable insights with our intuitive dashboards and visualization tools.

tabs.title: Analytics
tabs.description: Monitor key metrics in real-time with customizable widgets, interactive charts, and filtering options.

tabs.title: Reports
tabs.description: Schedule and automate reports with customizable templates, export options, and sharing capabilities.

tabs.title: Data Management
tabs.description: Import, clean, and organize your data from multiple sources in one secure platform.

tabs.title: Pr√©visions
tabs.description: Leverage AI-powered forecasting to predict trends and make data-driven decisions.

integrations.head: Integrations
integrations.title: Connect With Your Favorite Tools
integrations.description: CathaleIA seamlessly integrates with your existing tech stack to centralize your data and CathaleIA your workflow.

api.title: API & Custom Integrations
api.description: Need a custom integration? Our robust API and developer tools make it easy to connect CathaleIA with any system.
features: Webhook support for real-time data updates

steps.title: Select Your Integration
steps.description: Choose from our library of pre-built connectors or use our API.

steps.title: Authenticate & Configure
steps.description: Securely connect your accounts with OAuth or API keys.

steps.title: Map Your Data
steps.description: Define how data should flow between systems.

steps.title: Test & Deploy
steps.description: Verify everything works correctly and activate your integration.

security.head: Security
security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security for Your Data
security.description: We take data security seriously. Your information is protected with industry-leading security measures and compliance standards.

features.title: Data Encryption
features.description: All data is encrypted at rest and in transit using AES-256 and TLS 1.3 protocols.

features.title: Access Controls
features.description: Role-based access control, MFA, and SSO integration to ensure only authorized access.

features.title: Compliance
features.description: Compliant with GDPR, HIPAA, SOC 2 Type II, and other industry standards.

features.title: Secure Infrastructure
features.description: Hosted on secure cloud infrastructure with regular security audits and penetration testing.

oursecurity.title: Our Security Commitment
oursecurity.description: We implement a comprehensive security program that includes:
listsecurity: Regular security assessments and penetration testing
Strict data access policies and audit logging
Employee security training and background checks
Disaster recovery and business continuity planning

security.finaltext: Our compliance certifications demonstrate our commitment to maintaining the highest security standards.

testimonials.head: Testimonials
testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our clients say about our solution.

items.quote: Thanks to this platform, we now have real-time visibility into the status of our equipment. The integration with DEIF has been key to optimizing our predictive maintenance.
items.author: N/N

items.quote: The ability to analyze Motul oil samples and generate reports automatically has helped us reduce machine failures by 40%. An indispensable tool.
items.author: N/N

items.quote: The cloud has revolutionized how we manage our data. We can now make decisions based on accurate and up-to-date information, which has improved our operational efficiency.
items.author: N/N

pricing.head: Pricing
pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that's right for your team. All plans include a 14-day free trial.

plans.name: Starter
plans.description: Perfect for small teams just getting started.

plans.name: Professional
plans.description: Ideal for growing teams with more complex needs.

plans.name: Enterprise
plans.description: For large organizations with advanced requirements.
